segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and I can’t help but laugh at the absurdity of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn’t even notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookies like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, like she’s used to this kind of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how kids will do anything for a treat, even if it’s a little risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, but the woman doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a cartoon, and I can’t stop smiling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined, even if the stool is about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon, just to see her reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR
